SELECT MPD.COMPANY_CD , MPD.DIVISION_CD , MPD.REFERENCE_NO AS DR_NO , MPD.REFERENCE_DTL_NO AS DELIVERY_REQUEST_ID , MPD.TO_LOCATION_CD AS REQUEST_LOCATION_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_LOCATION_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD,MPD.DIVISION_CD,MPD.TO_LOCATION_CD) FROM DUAL) AS REQUEST_LOCATION_NM , MPD.FROM_LOCATION_CD AS ISSUE_LOCATION_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_LOCATION_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD,MPD.DIVISION_CD,MPD.FROM_LOCATION_CD) FROM DUAL) AS ISSUE_LOCATION_NM , MPD.ITEM_ID , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MI.ITEM_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MI.COMPANY_CD, MI.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MI.UNIT , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MI.COMPANY_CD, MI.DIVISION_CD, MI.UNIT ) FROM DUAL) AS UNIT_NM , MPD.QTY AS ISSUE_QTY , MPD.PROCESS_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_PROCESS_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD, MPD.DIVISION_CD, MPD.PROCESS_CD) FROM DUAL) AS PROCESS_NM , MPD.IO_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_IO_TYPE_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD, MPD.DIVISION_CD, MPD.IO_TYPE) FROM DUAL) AS IO_TYPE_NM , TO_CHAR(MPD.CREATE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREATE_DATE , MPD.CREATE_BY AS REQUEST_USER_NO ,(SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD, MPD.DIVISION_CD, MPD.CREATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS REQUEST_USER_NM , ROWIDTOCHAR(MPD.ROWID) AS KEY_ID , COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY MPD.COMPANY_CD,MPD.DIVISION_CD ORDER BY MPD.REFERENCE_DTL_NO) AS ROW_CNT , MPD.REFERENCE_NO , MPD.REFERENCE_DTL_NO FROM MOM_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_SHEET MPD , MOM_ITEM MI WHERE MPD.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MPD.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MPD.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MPD.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPD.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPD.PROCESS_CD = 'SR' AND MPD.APPLY_FLAG = 'N'
AND MPD.TO_LOCATION_CD = #{requestLocationCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
